title: UPDATED: Astana Sends Sprinter Ace Syritsa to B-Team as Chinese-Backed XDS Era Begins
content:
New-look XDS Astana confirms arrival of a Chinese racer and is reshuffling its deck for 2025 as it chases WorldTour salvation.

Read the full article at UPDATED: Astana Sends Sprinter Ace Syritsa to B-Team as Chinese-Backed XDS Era Begins on Velo.
author: ahood
